Articles.Content:
Fun times to be had with harassing the KerbalEVA object ;p

/me is also somewhat bored, so XD
Oh dear, I knew the day would come when the kerbals make their cloning devices small enough to fit in a command pod..
They must of accidently broken the Automatic Kerbal Makertm that fills the command pods.
What on earth? how did you do this.
... And that's where Kerbals come from!

One of many hundreds of bugs I had while preparing KerbalEVA Lifesupport for a full release... because I was bored and yongedevil put it on hold, again.

This one occurs when I added a "null resource" to KerbalEVA... (it would just throw an empty Kerbal out).... so to do this, I went in and "FlightEVA.fetch.spawn()"

*Hilariously, there were some iterations where the kerbals actually exploded on impact [i have no clue how... I did many things to try and get the code to work.]

Oh dear, I knew the day would come when the kerbals make their cloning devices small enough to fit in a command pod..

It's okay, it could be worse. They still haven't managed to make it fast enough to be able to build rockets that fly by expelling kerbals instead of burning rocket fuel.

It's okay, it could be worse. They still haven't managed to make it fast enough to be able to build rockets that fly by expelling kerbals instead of burning rocket fuel.

The way of the future!
This needs to be tried again in the latest version. NOW.
